title: Target, Walmart and More Stores Will Be Closed Again This Thanksgiving
sub_head: Closures during the Covid-19 pandemic proved popular with customers and employees, some retailers say
body:
Many retail employees will be able to eat turkey with their families this year as merchants from Target Corp. to Walmart Inc. keep physical locations closed on Thanksgiving Day for at least another year.
Some retailers decided last year to close their stores on Thanksgiving to limit crowds during the Covid-19 pandemic and to push more sales online. Now, following positive reactions from customers and employers, some are extending the policy.
